short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace words with other words or emojis

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple word replacer with a configuration page and an activation buton.
Made with ChatGPT.
It update live twitter pages and replace the defined words according to the configuration list of words to replace.
This was for research purpose but definitly could be useful for people.
